Name: ChatFight!
About the game: ChatFight! is a battle royale for stream VIEWERS . Play the game on stream and let your viewers customize their characters, equip ridiculous outfits, and fight to the death! Perfect for small groups of friends all the way up to hundreds of people beating each other up in hopes of being the absolute best at a game of PURE RNG . There is zero input from the viewers once their characters are in game, simply sit back and pray to the gods of RNG that your character will be victorious. Practical Uses For This Game Stream Giveaways tournament Bracket Seeding Entertaining Viewer Interaction Mindless Fun This game runs along with its website, where you can customize your character, view leaderboards, and keep up with any announcements for the game. Twitch connectivity requires a Twitch account.
Meta Title: ChatFight!: Oct 4, 2022, Kelvin Newton and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on ChatFight!? Check out the release date (Oct 4, 2022), developer insights from Kelvin Newton, and a complete game summary.
